title: Training Baris Perintah Linux - Panduan Lengkap
summary: Panduan lengkap step-by-step belajar command line Linux: pengertian, man, cd, ls, mkdir, ln, pwd, cp, rm, more, less, touch, mv (rename/move), shortcut terminal, dan penutup. Disertai contoh, opsi umum, tips, dan ilustrasi.
content_plain: Training Command Line Linux Panduan lengkap: 17 halaman Intro Definisi man cd ls mkdir ln pwd cp rm more less touch mv (rename) mv (move) Shortcut Penutup
